Social media circulation: The claim was widely circulated on social media platforms such as Facebook and Twitter, with multiple users sharing and discussing the video.
Multiple claims of authenticity: Various users and Facebook pages claimed that the video featured Narendra Modi doing yoga when he was 35 years old. These claims added to the viral nature of the video and its perceived authenticity.
False claims by unreliable sources: The video was shared by pages and individuals known for spreading false information in the past, such as Akash RSS. This raised doubts about the credibility of the claim.
Reverse image search: Alt News conducted a reverse image search and found a YouTube video from 1938 featuring different individuals practicing yoga. This contradicted the claim that the video showed Narendra Modi at the age of 35, as he was born in 1950.
